mapper.insert: insert into report (r_number, reported_user, r_content, reporter_user, r_regi_date, r_board_num) values (report_seq.NEXTVAL, #{reported_user}, #{r_content}, #{reporter_user}, sysdate, #{r_board_num})
mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM RN, A.* from (select * from report order by r_number desc) A) where RN between #{start} and #{end}
